header.marquee: IMPORTANT: Until further notice, all communications to our BUSD families will be coming directly from the district offices, not the school sites. If you have previously disabled district notifications, please update your preferences to include ALL District messaging (email, text, phone). Thank you.

div.div: Click here to follow Coronavirus updates for our school.

td.a: Minimum Day - Last Day of School

h1.a: Click Here for Coronavirus (COVID-19) BUSD Updates

section.p:
Emails are sent to the primary email address updated annually during registration. If you have not received an email, there area few things you can do:
1. Please log into your Aeries Parent Portal account. The messages are included in the daily feed on your dashboard.
2. From the Aeries parent portal, please verify the email address provided as the primary contact. If necessary, please update.
3. Please check your Aeries notifications settings and ensure all district messaging is enabled. Accounts are set to “all” by default; parents who have opted-out of receiving district communications will not receive an email.
4. Please check your email folders including junk and SPAM folders. Sometimes when a mass emailing is detected by service providers, emails are captured by the filter. In your email settings, please “whitelist” or mark all emails from BUSD as “safe”.
5. Please check the District website. All parent communications are posted under the Coronavirus Update graphic on the home page.
6. Follow Bonsall Unified School District on Facebook and @bonsallunified on Instagram.
The 2020-21 Instructional Calendar has been approved by the BUSD Board of Trustees.

h1.a: New Year, New Mission, New Vision

section.p: "I recently enjoyed facilitating a comprehensive group of staff members from all five schools through a process to develop a new mission and vision for the Bonsall Unified School District. After review from the board of trustees, they unanimously approved our new mission and vision at the January 15th board meeting. Below, our new mission clearly communicates the primary purpose of the Bonsall Unified School District, while the Vision explains the road map or building blocks that must be developed in order to fulfill our fundamental purpose." -- Superintendent David Jones
